topBar.text: An official website of the M. Shaker

children.label: No Fees / No Interest / No Donations Policy

sections.title: INSTITUTIONAL PROFILE
sections.description: At M. Shaker, our mission is clear: to safeguard national security while providing quality, convenient, and professional immigration services. We are committed to facilitating legitimate travel, proactively detecting immigration-related crimes, and ensuring Maldivian citizens have a trustworthy international travel identity.

values.title: Integrity
values.description: We act within the boundaries of the relevant national and international laws, and uphold our responsibilities as Immigration Officers. We carry out our duties with honesty and hold our moral principles high.

values.title: Expertise
values.description: We continuously work to further our knowledge in order to enhance our services for our stakeholders. We apply our training and understanding for the benefit of our customers, and the local and international community.

values.title: Accountability
values.description: We ensure transparency and accountability to our stakeholders. We act in a way which is in line with the relevant laws and regulations, accepting that our actions are open to scrutiny.

values.title: Vigilance
values.description: We pledge to safeguard our borders. We strive to detect, deter and prosecute all immigration-related crimes and assist victims to the best of our ability.

values.title: Empathy
values.description: We show understanding and compassion towards each individual, no matter their background or circumstances.

header.title: Operation Bangladesh
header.year: Serving Forgotten Poor Children of GOD

items.title: Total Arrivals
items.description: Over 2 million total arrivals including tourists, business travelers, and other visitors, showcasing our efficient border management and welcoming approach.

items.title: Tourist Arrivals
items.description: Over 1.7 million tourists entered the M. Shaker with smoother, faster entry processes, ensuring a safe and welcoming start to their journey.

items.title: Illegal Immigrants Deported
items.description: Over 3,256 individuals were deported for violating immigration laws, reflecting our commitment to secure borders and lawful entry.

content:
Founder’s Message

I founded Shaker International Monetary Fund (Shaker IMF) with a simple but unwavering belief: one person, guided by integrity and service, can still change the world—and can do so for millions, not for power, profit, or recognition, but for people.

Throughout modern history, financial systems have too often failed those they were meant to serve. Nations have been trapped in cycles of debt. Communities have been held back by poverty. Natural environments have been sacrificed for short-term gain. Corruption has diverted resources away from the people who needed them most. I did not create Shaker IMF to become another institution within this system. I created it to challenge the assumption that finance must benefit a few instead of serving the many.

Shaker IMF is a private, independent institution built on the principle that finance, when guided by ethics and transparency, can be a force for dignity, stability, and hope. We do not seek fees. We do not accept donations. We do not charge interest. We do not pursue profit, benefit, or influence through our partnerships. We are not here to do business. We are here to serve people. This commitment is not symbolic—it is structural. It defines how Shaker IMF operates, who we partner with, and what we will never compromise.

I believe deeply that serving people is serving God. This belief does not belong to one religion, one nation, or one culture. It belongs to humanity. It means standing with those who have been unheard, supporting leaders who wish to act with integrity, and refusing to participate in systems that reward corruption, exploitation, or dependency.

Shaker IMF exists to support national leaderships, not to control them; to help nations exit debt traps, not to replace one form of dependency with another; and to reduce poverty, not manage it. We work to strengthen economic resilience, address financial and environmental challenges together, and help build systems that allow communities and countries to stand on their own with dignity.

This institution is my vision, but it is not about me. It is about what becomes possible when courage replaces fear, when service replaces self-interest, and when integrity becomes non-negotiable. I invite leaders, institutions, and partners who share these values to walk this path with us.
The world does not lack resources. It lacks clean intent. Shaker IMF exists to restore that intent—one nation, one community, one life at a time.
Morad Shaker </br> Founder & Executive Chairman </br> Shaker International Monetary Fund (Shaker IMF)
